recipe.title: Eight Treasure Duck
recipe.instructions: boil duck for 20 minutes and take it out. serve.

recipe.title: Cheese Cake
recipe.ingredients:
1 (9 inch) graham cracker crust,
3 eggs,
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese,
recipe.instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C.)
In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese, white sugar and 1/2 cup confectioners sugar until smooth. Beat in 1 cup sour cream, milk and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Slowly beat in eggs, one at a time. Pour filling into crust.

recipe.title: Egg Sanwich
recipe.ingredients: 8 eggs, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, salt, pepper, 1/4 teaspoon paprika
recipe.instructions:
Place egg in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop.

Place the chopped eggs in a bowl, and stir in the mayonnaise, mustard and green onion. Season with salt, pepper and paprika. Stir and serve on your favorite bread or crackers.
